menu_items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu_items.description: Classic Italian pasta with creamy sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.

menu_items.name: Margherita Pizza
menu_items.description: Traditional pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil.

menu_items.name: California Roll
menu_items.description: Crab, avocado, cucumber, and sushi rice rolled in seaweed.

menu_items.name: Spicy Tuna Roll
menu_items.description: Tuna mixed with spicy mayo, rolled with sushi rice and seaweed.

menu_items.name: Chicken Tacos
menu_items.description: Grilled chicken with lettuce, cheese, and salsa in a soft tortilla.

menu_items.name: Beef Burrito
